comment.target_folder: The location of data for calculating connectedness
comment.start_date: the start date of the predicted connectedness
comment.end_date: the end date of the predicted connectedness
comment.maximum_lag: The maximum lag to make VAR calculation
comment.periods_for_one_conn: The number of periods to calculate one connectedness
comment.predict_conns_periods: How forward predicted periods of connectedness
comment.batch_size: The number of elements in a batch
comment.label_size: The number of labels (up and down)
comment.conns_for_one_element: The conns_for_one_element defines how many periods in one element, which means how many conns match one movement; the time periods of LSTM
comment.predict_movement_periods: predict_movement_periods means how many periods to be predicted; 如果 predict_movement_periods <= predict_conns_periods，那就表示不會有可以做test validation的資料，因為都拿來training了
comment.is_continue_conn: whether to keep calculating rolling connectedness
